turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order four small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one with just cheese, one with just pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One Hawaiian and one chicken bacon ranch, all of them with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 thick crust pizzas, 1 cheese, 1 pepperoni, 1 hawaiin, and 1 chicken bacon ranch, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 45 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That should be it for me. Thank you.
